cli.description: Play tiktok as a translucent overlay over anything

args.name: opacity
args.description: The opacity of the overlay window, between 0.0 and 1.0, defaults to 0.6

args.name: url
args.description: The URL to open, defaults to https://www.tiktok.com/foryou

args.name: exit-on-stdin-close
args.description: Exit the application when stdin is closed (e.g. as a child process when the parent process exits). This option is used by VibeRot.
